unnormalised: The buzz around the new GST rules is real, folks! Businesses are scrambling to update their records, and it's a bit of a headache, tbh. Especially with the new system requiring accurate GSTINs for all transactions. Seems like everyone's triple-checking invoices now.
normalised: The buzz around the new G-S-T rules is real, folks! Businesses are scrambling to update their records, and it's a bit of a headache, to be honest. Especially with the new system requiring accurate G-S-T-I-Ns for all transactions. Seems like everyone's triple-checking invoices now.

unnormalised: Big news is that the deadline for linking PAN to Aadhaar has been extended again - to 30/06/2024, apparently. So, if you haven't done it yet, get on it ASAP. The IT department’s warning that unlinked PANs will become inoperative is kinda scary, no? Imagine trying to file your ITR with an inactive PAN - major mess! It impacts your ability to do almost any financial transction these days.
normalised: Big news is that the deadline for linking P-A-N to Aadhaar has been extended again - to thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four, apparently. So, if you haven't done it yet, get on it A-S-A-P. The I-T department’s warning that unlinked P-A-Ns will become inoperative is kind of scary, no? Imagine trying to file your I-T-R with an inactive P-A-N - major mess! It impacts your ability to do almost any financial transaction these days.

unnormalised: And did you know the MCA (Ministry of Corporate Affairs) has also updated the SPICe+ form for company registration? Now it requires more detailed information, including mandatory details about the registered office address and directors' DINs. Registration seems like a lot now, specially for small companies.
